extendedInfo.description: Some very interesting and amazing facts for kids and parents. Parents should tell these facts to the children. This app will increase children's General Knowledge. You will get to know about unknown facts. Facts on countries, inventors, people, recent activities and much more. Animal facts, Astronomy facts, interesting facts to know. Awesome Amazing facts.This app will also expose factoids, present-day orthodoxy, identify misinformation, clarify the confusing, and present new information. It's cool and fun Enjoy!!Sample do you know facts from this android application:1) A Mandrill is the biggest monkey.2) A whale is as long as a tennis court and eats upto four tons of food in one day.3) Hippopotamus can close their nostrils and live up to 5 minutes.4) Elephants can live up to 60 to 70 years.Features:100+ unknown awesome things to know.easy to use user interfaceoption to send question/answer to email/dropbox/sms etc.If you have any complaint/suggestion regarding this application, do contact us at http://www.javaexperience.com/contact-usTags: Night education facts for children, Facts on animals, plants and humans
